section.header: What to do if one of your players has stopped responding to messages.
section.body:
First, ask around to make sure it's not just you. (If it is, you should probably apologize for whatever you said. Communication is vital to your survival here, and way more important than your pride.) If the player isn't responding to anyone at all, TREAT THIS AS AN EMERGENCY SITUATION. Have their server player track them down, if possible. If not, have anyone who can get to their Land searching for them as soon as possible.
Self-isolation is one of the early symptoms of exposure to certain negative influences that can not only kill that player, but derail your entire session, possibly badly enough to kill everyone in the session. Take this very seriously.
